text: 'With efforts of Hon PM Sri '
'Narendra Modi'
' & Hon HM Sri Amit Shah, the '
'#NE'

'#Itanagar'

'Dr Jitendra Singh'

Sir, Heartiest welcome to hon'ble HM @AmitShah ji for his great visit in Assam. We wish that his great visit in Assam will become a fruitful for Assam. Thanks to you sir for your leadership do have done rare efforts for the @BJP 4India .

On every ongoing issue, we hear your thoughtful comments through media and people tend to believe most of them. Why are you so silent about Clause 6 report and it's implementation ? Why HM is ignoring the committee ? Hasn't it been BJP's commitment for Assam ? You are first an Assamese and then rest. If your community is at risk of existence, what will you do by becoming a minister ?
People of Assam with you... Go-ahead. All the best sir.
Very nice sahab ji. Proud of you sahab ji. GOD BLESS YOU SAHAB JI.
Go ahead sir. Definitely we shall achieve our goals.
Great Leader of North East,Dr.Himanta
Biswa Sarma Sir Long Live.
Go ahead sir, we want a progressive northeast under your leadership, god bless you
It's very unfortunate for assam & assamese people that honourable home ministar is delaying to take report of clause 6 imlemenation commitee which has been furnished already.
This is true. Hope we shall see more development.

' It is the enormous love and affection of friends that keep me going. Met many loving youth and elderly today at my office. God is kind to have given me this opportunity to do my bit for welfare of people.'
Sir  আপোনাক লৈ আমি বহু আশা বাদী সদূৰ ভৱিষ্যতলৈ কিন্তু আপোনাৰ শিক্ষা বিভাগৰ   কাহিলী পাৰা ডাইৰেক্টৰ কাৰ্য্যালয়ৰ পৰা ফাইল কিয় লুকা ভাকু হয়  , চাৰ অনুগ্ৰহ কৰি অলপ খবৰ ৰাখিব

I have visited the orphanage in your father's name.
It touched my heart on the great work you do and yet remain humble in not letting anyone know about it.
Much regards!

Sir , you are really a great politician and heart throb of Assam . you're an ideal leader. Sir you have decided to provincialise the venture schools .It is good step .but remorseful matter is that you want to make teachers "tutor". Why are we degraded ? For years we have been serving in the venture institution s without salaries . Now  we are the victim of discrimination .why you have taken such decision . You're requested to reconsider the issue . Please do something better for us .we don't want to be TUTOR .
Sir, these Hon people comes with some hope, that only you can do something for them.

You are right that it's God's blessings that you have given opportunity to serve the people. In this world, in India and in Assam so many leaders, but people go with their problems to only few and you are one of them.
Your energetic work and the best initiative support to us always inspired...Hear
tly Salute your Dynamic and Energetic Leadership... God bless u for ever and ever Sir.

The HS Schools have been facing financial crises. The former edu minister did nothing in this connection. Now the only hope is upon you.

BJP is focusing on samarohz, rallies,  meeting, functions only.  Rather could have applied this energy in coordinating  ground level performances.  After elections,  I have not seen our MLA in our area for the last four years. BJP has already paid a lot in the states like Rajasthan,  MP,  Maharashtra,  Jharkhand,  Chhatisgarh and now in Delhi.  Performance based politics like what Mr Kejriwal did in Delhi is totally lacking in BJP ruled states.  It is bitter to hear but it's a harsh reality. Sorry to mention Sir,  but as I m a BJP voter so could dare to write.
